Name: SoftwareName
Description: The name of the software package, including its producer.

Name: SoftwarePackage
Description: A coded value from a controlled vocabulary, describing the software package.

Name: SoftwareVersion
Description: The version of the software package. Defaults to '1.0'.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the software. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: Date
Description: Supported date of the software package with, at minimum, a release date if known.

Name: Function
Description: Identifies the functions handled by this software. Repeat for multiple functions. It may be advisable to note only those functions used in the specific usage of the software.

Name: Lang
Description: Language (human language) of the software package.
